DOC.brief_title: Internet Obesity Treatment Enhanced With Motivational Interviewing
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled trial design determine whether weight loss group behavioral weight loss intervention conduct Internet increase inclusion individual , online MI session . All participant receive online 6-month group-based behavioral weight loss program follow 12 month weight maintenance . Overweight obese adult two study sty ( N=426 ) randomize ( 1 ) Internet intervention ; 2 ) Internet intervention individual MI session occur three month interval fix schedule ( Internet+MI-Fixed ) . Assessments conduct every six month include measure body weight height , diet exercise behavior , Quality Life , adherence measure ( eg. , attendance , compliance self-monitoring ) , social influence component , motivation , treatment satisfaction , demographic data descriptive information regard use website component .
